description: Almond extract and toasted almonds give this dairy free rice pudding lots of flavour.
name: Almond Rice Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 120°C/100°C fan-forced. Mix the rice, milk, soy cream, honey, vanilla and almond extract together and tip in to an ovenproof dish.
Bake for 30 minutes, stir and bake for another 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and leave to stand for 10 minutes to finish thickening up.
While the pudding is cooling, spread the almonds on a baking sheet and place in the oven for 10 minutes to toast. Serve the rice pudding with toasted almonds scattered on top.
